desc: Building production-grade AI systems including RAG pipelines for academic resources using vector databases (Pinecone, ChromaDB), agentic workflows with LangChain/LlamaIndex, and automated LLM evaluation pipelines. Developing FastAPI backends, engineering advanced prompts for curriculum-aligned tutoring, and optimizing embedding strategies and retrieval accuracy.

Led team of 5 developers to create 'Mario's Multiverse Adventure' - a 2D platformer with OpenGL, SFML audio, and SQLite. Features 3 unique levels, collision detection, physics engine, and YouTube gameplay demo.

Presented research on emerging issues in changing climatic scenarios at the 2nd South Asian Conference. Conducted statistical analysis and data visualization on climate data trends for the South Asian region.

Secured 1st Runner-Up in the App Showcase category at AIUB CS FEST 2024. Competed against 20+ teams, demonstrating innovative mobile application development with technical proficiency and presentation skills to industry judges.
